column4: Anyone used the voice capability of Gaim 2?  I'm looking for ways to reduce my phone bill.
I heard -vv is not in gaim-2.0 yet, try skype first
How's skype work?  I've never tried/seen it.
I use skype to call my friends in taiwan, China, even better than most phonecards, and computer to computer is free
Free is very much the goal.
the only thing bad is, skype is not GPL
I'm still willing to consider it at least.
tell me whether skype is in ubuntu, it's not in debian, because of the GPL issue
There's a Breezy deb available from Seveas.
gnomemeeting can do it also, but kind of crap to me :( skype is easy to use, and universal, linux, windows, mac, bsd,...
I couldn't get gnomemeeting to work with an IP, only sip something or other.
I tested, gnomemeeting with a windows (netmeeting)
amsn is nice but not international by design
I don't much need international as far as language, etc.  Just Canada-USA.
much easier then, but I speak Chinese
